name: FIFA 22 Seasons Menu Additions
description:
Took the FIFA 22 Seasons menu and added some UI features that I think could be interesting for the FIFA community. Created using Figma, Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

Navigate the menu using PlayStation Controllers: use arrow keys to navigate around menus, 'x' to select, 'o' to go back. Focused on the added menu feature "STATS". This feature does not exist in the actual game. Currently only the "TEAMS" feature within "STATS" is developed. Working on "PLAYERS" and "IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS.
